cohortName: [PL 37311061001] Disease caused by 2019-nCoV referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (37311061) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 37311061002] Disease caused by 2019-nCoV referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (37311061) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 37311061003] Persons tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 with at least 365d prior observation
[PL 37311061004] Persons hospitalized with a COVID-19 diagnosis record or a SARS-CoV-2 positive test
[PL 37311061005] Persons with a COVID-19 diagnosis or a SARS-CoV-2 positive test with no required prior observation
